data.name: One helluva day
data.detailed_description:
The plot.


Self-centered CEO is desperately trying to save his company from collapse. Together with that he is forced to rescue the entire town from an impending disaster.

Every game character is a puzzle itself that can be solved or broken, so there are two ways to follow.

Evil (the easy way).

You can steal things you need. You can trick characters you meet. You make no fiends, but still advance the story and achieve to the goal.

Good (the hard way).

You can do things the right way. You can help other characters to solve their own problems. You can support people and by doing so achieve the goal.

All the game characters you dealt with will meet you at the end of the game. The way you have been behaving throughout the game and decisions you made will affect the ending of the game.

The game has several completely different endings.

Features

  • Classic point-and-click gameplay, featuring both pointing and clicking.
  • A variety of wacky puzzles.
  • Over 2000 lines of written dialog.
  • Interactive quirky characters each with own unique story.
  • Unique and peculiar hand drawn 2D Art-Style and 2D animation.
  • Original soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
